lender.name: Two Palms
lender.loan_because: We're lucky and fortunate; we want to share with others.
lender.occupational_info:
He = Volunteering at the hospital, sitting on the beach, by the pool, or blogging on the Internet.
She = Sitting on the beach or helping Seniors live a better life.

lender.name: cynthia
lender.loan_because: I am interested in growing the lives of women in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work with large healthcare organizations to develop strategies to improve business.

lender.name: Roberto
lender.loan_because: It empowers people who are willing to make a difference in their lives to rise above poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I build programs for computers

lender.name: Magali
lender.loan_because: Helping others in their efforts toward improving their circumstances is the right, and human, thing to do.

lender.name: Chris & Marisa
lender.loan_because: a little goes a long way!

lender.name: Russell & Pamela
lender.occupational_info: Chiropractic/Acupuncture/Nutrition

lender.name: Maryam
lender.loan_because: I want to end poverty.

lender.name: Manuel
lender.loan_because: little money makes the difference, thats great.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping and giving...

lender.name: Rossana
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference
lender.occupational_info: I am an accountant during the day but love to cook food from all over the world (and eat it) in my free time.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Empowering people to accomplish self made goals is to help, uplift, and succeed while invigorating to both themselves and all around them. Success of any type is contagious to all around. That is the best way to re-invent the spirit of giving to others.
lender.occupational_info: Assisting others around the world to be able to communicate thru computers on a day-to-day basis.

lender.name: Giovanni
lender.loan_because: I am human. I see other humans as a part of myself.
lender.occupational_info: My work is involved with cartoon animation for children. I believe that children need bread as much as they need joy and dreams.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: This is a cool idea. I have heard of it but now with the power of online banking it can be done so easily.
lender.occupational_info: I am an information technology manager and I believe that lowcost open source computing can transform the world.

lender.name: sherwood
lender.loan_because: I load because i love to help children and people to helf themself too.
lender.occupational_info: I work making houses for my country Barbados in the west Indies.

lender.name: Masud
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to have some money to spare.

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: money is always in transition. It comes and goes. Usually goes out more than what comes back! But today I'm lucky enough to have some to share. Tomorrow who knows!?
lender.occupational_info: I help students get funding to pay for their education, and ultimately achieve their dreams. Of utmost importance is to provide someone with the tools to become self-sufficient, and in turn, help others. Always.

lender.name: Jacqueline
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone has the potential to achieve their personal dream as long as resources are available to make it a reality.
lender.occupational_info: Finding solutions to the basic human needs-food, shelter and community.

lender.name: PATSY
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference. Give someone a helping hand.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I know what it is like to not have any where to turn. My heart and prayers go out to each and ever one of these wonderful people. I love you all.

lender.name: Penny
lender.loan_because: Everybody needs for someone to be on the other side of hope.
lender.occupational_info: I work to make the world a better place and sometimes I make movies.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: It simply makes sense to share good fortune.

lender.name: Courtney
lender.loan_because: I loan because I am greatful to live in a country that values the family system and younger generations of humanity. I feel blessed to make a living by teaching children through play and creative exploration. I would love to pass on some of that freedom of life to those in search of it. I believe that providing the opportunity to create local enterprise and satisfy local needs is one of the best ways to strengthen society, help people to escape poverty, and bring real progress and development.
lender.occupational_info: I work with developmentaly delayed young children. I teach their parents to understand why their child is doing the "funny" things they don't understand and help them turn these "strange" behaviors into productive teaching moments and real connections between parent and child. These real connections enhance the relationship and shared loving experience and then the child grows and learns from this shared and special moment.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: i want my Children to see that 1 person really can effect an entire community
lender.occupational_info: I sell steel, aluminum ,copper ,brass etc. to people all over the world

lender.name: Miha
lender.loan_because: I like to see how small amounts of money get wisely spent and can make a change on the other side of the world...

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: I believe that systemic poverty is the harshest tragedy facing our generation.
lender.occupational_info: I lead a company that measures and scores the quality of workplaces.

lender.name: Ivette
lender.loan_because: I want to share my blessings
lender.occupational_info: I work in my house and my garden ,I am retired.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: People need my help.

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I teach in a program that deals largely with low income students who have been in trouble at school.

lender.name: Samuel
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I'm a college student.

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: i can.
lender.occupational_info: i provide government support to children and families in need.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed..., Pay it forward...
lender.occupational_info: I am an entrepreneur... I match opportunity with people...

lender.name: Rob & Stephanie
lender.loan_because: We are so blessed and grateful to be able to share with others.

lender.name: Mindy
lender.loan_because: I can be the change I want to see in the world.

lender.name: Ilene
lender.loan_because: It helps people remain independent
lender.occupational_info: I run the computer game company, Snood

lender.name: KELLY
lender.loan_because: I loan because I care. We are all children of God.

lender.name: Angie & Brian
lender.loan_because: trying to love my neighbor as myself...
lender.occupational_info: I work on airplanes

lender.name: Jenn
lender.loan_because: I appreciate the potential to have a more direct impact on someone's life.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: The more people that are uplifted from poverty, the more people can contribute towards the Singularity.

lender.name: Shirley
lender.loan_because: Purely selfish reason - there is no better feeling than helping those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I work out of my home as an independent contractor doing medical transcription.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: Marketplace commerce is the only way to empower individuals, financially and otherwise, worldwide. I want to be a part of that.
lender.occupational_info: I am involved in oil and gas transactions, and natural resource, energy and environmental law.

lender.name: vital
lender.loan_because: I think is a nice way to help someone
lender.occupational_info: I do remodeling fixing peoples houses

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I want to help

lender.name: Victoria
lender.loan_because: When people can work they can take care of their family. People are all the same, they want to take care of those they love. I have been so lucky.
lender.occupational_info: I help design advertising to sell products.

lender.name: Craig and Sue
lender.loan_because: God tells us to take care of the poor
lender.occupational_info: We take care of seniors who can't live alone, and take care of themselves. A companionship relationship. Taking them to Dr. appointments, etc.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I want to help people you want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I install computer systems so that large businesses can process their business information easily between 1000's of people working at the business.

lender.name: Elaine
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Chadwick
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. My wife is from an under privilidged country and we want to do everything that we can to help people change their economic standing.
lender.occupational_info: We work reselling items via internet (on ebay).

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I want to be part of helping someone to have a better life. I know what it is like to struggle and now that I'm in a better position to help, I find it humbling to be able to make a difference in families lives all across the world.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I believe that helping others is key not only to the survival of the world but also to my inner peace.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: I believe microfinance is a powerful tool to alleviate world poverty
lender.occupational_info: Studying to become a lawyer

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: Its feels good to help someone less fortunate then me.
lender.occupational_info: I am a residential Realtor in South Florida and also have a home based travel business.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I believe microlending is the best way to help people in poverty

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: I admire anyone who works hard for a better quality of life.

lender.name: Marey
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to help people better their lives.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: of Love ;0)

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: when giving is a priority, the world runs better.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a center that provides educational services to children who struggle in school.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I would like to help people who help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I teach many subjects in a small rural high school: Current World Problems and Solutions, French, and English.

lender.name: GDP upgrade
lender.loan_because: Its luck that we weren't born in their conditions.

lender.name: Myka
lender.loan_because: I don't have much (for someone who lives in the SF Bay Area) and I've always wanted to find a way to help people. This was something I could do.
lender.occupational_info: I am receptionist. I answer phones, book travel, make coffee, organize, order supplies.

lender.name: Eve
lender.loan_because: This first loan is in honor of my dear friend Margie, who always tried to make the world a better place. Future loans to express my thankfulness for all I have been given in life.
lender.occupational_info: I help identify health issues and problems in the U.S., especially among minority populations. I hope my work will contribute to ultimately improving their health and quality of life.

lender.name: Miss Molly Bell
lender.loan_because: I have a special place in my heart for people taking risks in order to start a business. Everyone has something to offer and the simplest event can take off!!!
lender.occupational_info: I am part time professional actress on the stage, part time voice and dance teacher and full time mom. I have also just starting writing a new musical!

lender.name: Quenten
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I am a school administrator.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate in my life and I want to spread the fortune!
lender.occupational_info: I organize conventions and meetings for a large hotel chain

lender.name: Nic
lender.loan_because: I want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a 6 year old kid who wants to help others.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: there is no better feeling in the world than to be able to help others less fortunate and see them succeed. I have seen first hand how dedicated and hard working these individuals are and all they need is a little funding to help them become self-sufficient.

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to have abundance in my life and I want to share as much as I can with others. I think Kiva is a brilliant idea.
lender.occupational_info: I work in Public Health for the US government. I spend my days trying to prevent or at least lessen disease throughout the world.

lender.name: Aimee
lender.loan_because: I want to help people that want to help themselves. I want to teach my daughters the joy of giving.
lender.occupational_info: I help attorneys and their clients prepare their cases to present to a court.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I believe growing economies help keep regions stable, preventing violence. And I believe in international compassion. And I always wanted to have my own business, so I want to let other people have theirs.
lender.occupational_info: I figure out new ways to discover pharmaceuticals

lender.name: Joey
lender.loan_because: There is so much need in this world. I hope to help individuals make a better life for themselves and their families. I want to share some of the many blessings God has given me.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a large medical lab where I help primary care doctors better understand the causes of their patients' birth defects, infertility or cancer.

lender.name: Mindi & Jadon
lender.loan_because: We want to be the change that we wish to see in the world

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I'm no longer participating with Kiva because Tanzania took all my money and didn't pay it back. I don't know what I was thinking... Tanzania, seriously?

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: Because I truly believe this is the way to change the world.
lender.occupational_info: My job is to help people make their home ownership dreams a reality.

lender.name: Hollie
lender.loan_because: To help others help themselves

lender.name: Monique
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: Everyone can use a hand that can lift up instead of a hand out only!
lender.occupational_info: Teach, train, motivate and inspire youth to achieve straight "A's" in the school of life!

lender.name: Juan Jose
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to have what I need. Giving is an important part of my life's mission ( Help, Inspire , Give).

lender.name: Morgan
lender.loan_because: we should all be the change we wish to see in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I'm in sales but fortunately work for a company that is dedicated to helping non profits, like Kiva, succeed.

lender.name: San Roque High School
lender.loan_because: We have a great opportunity to be educated and we care.
lender.occupational_info: We help translate loans from Spanish. To see our hard work, go to the LEND page and change the Status tab from "In Need" to "All". Then type in "San Roque High School" and click Search.

lender.name: Charlene
lender.loan_because: I have more than I need, and I love to share.
lender.occupational_info: I help lead an eye surgery clinic and surgery center where we do many cataract surgeries every year.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: To share a little of the good fortune I have had in my life.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: Communications Manager

lender.name: Jewelia
lender.loan_because: It's a way helping others.
lender.occupational_info: Wife, Mom, singer, songwriter

lender.name: Ampsca
lender.loan_because: I loan because i am blessed to be able to.

lender.name: oscar
lender.loan_because: I like to help People

lender.name: BMIGaming.Com
lender.occupation: Selling Arcade Games, Amusement & Vending Machines
lender.loan_because: At BMIGaming.com, we strongly believe in social entrepreneurship, and in lending assistance to those who are willing to help themselves. And we fully support microlending organizations like KIVA that help turn the poverty-stricken globally into self-sustaining individuals with dignity.
lender.occupational_info: We sell FUN - And help bring smiles to people across the world, while running the "World's Largest Gaming Marketplace" for both commercial and residential arcade game clients in over 90 countries worldwide.

lender.name: Larry and Jenny
lender.loan_because: We are excited about Kiva because we can make an immediate impact by reaching out to someone who wants to work toward a better life.

lender.name: Paula
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: I help couples learn how to have more connected and better relationships

lender.name: Marisha Nowak
lender.loan_because: To connect to my global family.
lender.occupational_info: I am a sales agent. All the products represented conserve water, fertilizer, energy and/or labor.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I believe we all need to help each other.
lender.occupational_info: I follow the Jewish religion to help repair the world. That is why I made this loan

lender.name: Alisa & Guy
lender.loan_because: We can make an impact in someone's life - even if the loan is not a large amount of money.

lender.name: Mou
lender.loan_because:
"The best portion of a good man's life; His little, nameless, unremembered acts of kindness and of love" -William Wordsworth
The quote above is not completely relevant to this situation...but it captures some of the spirit.
It is a simple way to be involved.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I help people become emotionally healthy and happy

lender.name: Gerry
lender.loan_because: I want to share what I have been given.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired school health care worker.

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: I have so much and would like to share.

lender.name: Lynda and Matt
lender.loan_because: We want to see families thrive and create a feeling of security for themselves and their families.

lender.name: Preservation Properties
lender.loan_because: I've always believed in 'act locally, think globally.' Now, with Kiva, one can easily 'act globally, think locally'.
lender.occupational_info: EcoBroker working to make Sustainable Properties an affordable reality for everyone.

lender.name: Heide and Lynn
lender.loan_because: We want to help others, who are trying to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Lynn does mammography (xray) Hedie works with developmentally disabled deaf adults

lender.name: Holland
lender.loan_because: "An ounce of practice is worth more than tons of preaching." Mohandas Gandhi
lender.occupational_info: I work with students and teachers in an urban school district within Houston, Texas.

lender.name: k.l
lender.loan_because: it feels good to help people help themselves

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: I want to help others, and make any changes that "I" can help with, and I know if "I" can help today it was a good day, and tomorrow will be even better!
lender.occupational_info: I am in a career change myself, and I quit a job that I was at for 7 years.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I want to support women in their efforts to become self-sustaining

lender.name: Kristina
lender.loan_because: I've been fortunate enough to have had people who gave of their time and mentored me because they saw potential. This is my way of saying thank you to them for that faith, and to try to do my part to make a difference to someone also.
lender.occupational_info: I primarily manage both small and large scale projects for a global wireless software company.

lender.name: Cherry Fairy
lender.loan_because: One person can make a difference. And helping others keeps you young.

lender.name: Susie
lender.loan_because: I know how empowering it is to start a small business and would like to help others do the same.

lender.name: CAV
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy... even though I'm not wealthy, I can make a difference.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I am a single mother who has struggled for years to make ends meet...recently I had to stop working due to illness but am grateful that I live in Canada with universal medical and wonderful benefits...so I believe it is my duty as a citizen of the world to share what little I have...
lender.occupational_info: I worked many years as a Chaplain (minister) in the school system...helping teenagers through crisis and trying to give them a sense of meaning and purpose in their lives...as well as a sense of their responsibility to help others less fortuante.

lender.name: Bruce & Cheri
lender.loan_because: We love to travel and have many of our greatest memories from travel in countries that need the help and opportunity that Kiva is providing. We have a very busy and wonderful life in the San Francisco Bay area and are always looking for ways where we can be more involved and give. I (Bruce) have been very fascinated by the simple brilliance of the micro lending approach to giving since I first heard of it a few years ago and have been looking for a way to get involved. Kiva was the perfect opportunity for us to take the first step.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: What an exciting way to help others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Responsible for the regulatory compliance in a small bank.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: I want my children to learn to love and share with others.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing for me to do
lender.occupational_info: Help people Buy or Sell Homes

lender.name: Roz & Bill
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference in the world and help others to achieve their Dreams! Sharing the Blessings we have been given is our goal!

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: I want to support small entrepruener efforts in manufacturing.
lender.occupational_info: I find suppliers all over the world and work with them to develop their production methods and business.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Paralegal. Legal advocate.

lender.name: richard
lender.loan_because: im a small business
lender.occupational_info: we repair refrigrators and other appliances like washers and dryers ect.

lender.name: CHRISTINA
lender.occupation: FULL TIME MOTHER OF 4 AND COLLEGE STUDENT

lender.name: Jessie
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Helping people

lender.name: Zana
lender.loan_because: it allows me the opportunity to pool my funds with other lenders, which can then be used to make a profound difference in the lives of those who otherwise would never qualify for a conventional loan. It's knowing that most people around the world, given a chance, can excel.
lender.occupational_info: Now that I am retired, my work is easy, ... it's being the best wife, mother, friend and Oma that I can be.

lender.name: Haruko
lender.loan_because: I'd like to do something to change the world.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I design websites for small businesses.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: This is an amazing grassroots effort to give people a hand up, and though I love giving hand outs too, this seems that it will have a life long impact and make a difference for people. We are all connected. Let's help each other!
lender.occupational_info: I work with people with terminal illness and their families. I work as part of a team that helps them cope with grief & loss and assists them in dying well.

lender.name: Maureen
lender.loan_because: it will help others- we are so blessed in our lives- "to whom much is given, much is expected"
lender.occupational_info: I stay home and take care of my daughters. I also try to help friends and the larger community.

lender.name: Martha
lender.loan_because: I would like to help make a difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Tanya
lender.loan_because:
Everyone in this world deserves a chance to succeed.
My favorite quote about kindnes:
"When you are kind to others, it not only changes you, it changes the world." Harold Kushner
lender.occupational_info: The most rewarding job in the world.

lender.name: Grant
lender.loan_because: This is doing the right thing.
lender.occupational_info: Computers

lender.name: Alexandra
lender.loan_because: "We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give." -- Winston Churchill

lender.name: Juliet
lender.loan_because: It gives me joy to help women help themselves and others through their businesses.

lender.name: Paris
lender.loan_because: I believe all people need is a little help, a little boost, an opportunity to better themselves. At the end, they all do it by themselves and the credit is all theirs!

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: "If you think of life as like a big pie, you can try to hold the whole pie and kill yourself trying to keep it, or you can slice it up and give some to the people around you, and you still have plenty left for yourself." -Jay Leno
lender.occupational_info:
I enjoy working as a docent(volunteer educator) to help children and adults learn about and better appreciate the natural wonders of our local forests, rivers and sea.
My paying job is at the local humane society where I do office work and lots of the other tasks involved in fundraising, promoting our spay/neuter program and of course finding new, loving homes for the county's unwanted dogs and cats.

lender.name: Oscar
lender.loan_because: I don't need another graphic tee

lender.name: Leila, Jim, & Jason
lender.loan_because: This is an excellent way of fighting poverty at the grassroots level.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: Imagine what this world would be like if everyone made a loan!

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I simply want to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a property management company in Huntington Beach, California, USA

lender.name: Pam Sue
lender.loan_because: When I learned about Kiva, I had no choice but to come here - my heart would not take NO for an answer!

lender.name: Pam
lender.loan_because: I want to help empower others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach science to middle school students. I promote conservation of wildlife. I'm looking for sustainable renewable solutions to cooking fuel problem in the DR Congo. It causes villagers to rely on charcoal obtained illegally from protected wildlife areas which are home to the endangered mountain gorilla. If you have any suggestions, please check out the gorilla protection blog on wildlifedirect.org. Also check out http://www.workingvillages.org/main.html

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: Although I am not wealthy, I am lucky to live in a relatively wealthy country. It is wonderful to be able to do something to help someone struggling to make their life better, despite my limited resources.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired with a medical disability. For many years, I was an Executive Assistant in a lawyer's office.

lender.name: Isabella
lender.loan_because: My Mommy wants to teach me how to help others in need.
lender.occupational_info: I am only 8 months old, and I just hang out with my family. But, I am learning new things every day. Mommy and Daddy want to start me out in helping others in need.

lender.name: Jaime
lender.loan_because: I am blessed.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I feel so fortunate and blessed in my life. I may not have much but I have enough! I also love the fact that my sons already know how good it is to help others. It feels great to be able to do something for another person no matter how small. We all make a difference in every life we touch whether we know it or not. Pay it forward....and it will come back many times over. This site is all about that and I love that!
lender.occupational_info: I have 2 boys, 5 and 3 so work is 24 hours! I am also an office manager at a surgery center.

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: I truly believe that people want to do well for themselves; they just need a little help to get there.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 12-14 year old children mathematics.

lender.name: Sharnay
lender.loan_because: I have been in a place in my life when I have needed money to get back on my feet. I now find myself with a bit of money to loan and am happy that I can help someone who has a dream and a vision.
lender.occupational_info: I am the General Manager for a silk screener. We create custom printed t-shirts for schools, companies, bands and other organizations.

lender.name: Jodie
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of contribution. I love knowing that I'm making a difference in someone else's life.
lender.occupational_info: I work with organizations to develop their leaders and instill the habits to make them successful.

lender.name: jayne
lender.loan_because: "to know that one life has breathed easier because I have lived. This is to have succeeded." (Ralph Waldo Emerson)

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: we are all connected and I love being part of a team that gives and helps each other.
lender.occupational_info: I train service dogs for children with disabilites. They help improve the quality of life for the child in many ways including putting a smile on their face, and I smile doing the work as well. It feeds my soul.

lender.name: Merylin
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like to want to do something that can better your family and have a positive effect on the community.
lender.occupational_info: I stay at home and raise my daughter and take care of the household while my husband works.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I am so pleased seeing the success of people all over the world with a little bit of help from others. I am so blessed and am happy to share with others
lender.occupational_info: I am a court lawyer in civil cases, e.g. lawsuits in U.S. courts

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I'm a business owner, and I want to help others like me all over the world, one person at a time.

lender.name: Donnetta
lender.occupational_info: I work with women who are self-injurers. There is only one organization in the US for them to seek help if they have the proper insurance, so I have designed agency using a holistic approach to help these girls. I am in need of funding so I can get this off the ground. I have a list of girls waiting for this to be open so they can heal.

lender.name: elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I saw a "Oprah" show taking about giving and learned about KIVA. I was so blown away by these people that generally have very little and still are so brave to go out and try and better themselves. I think of myself as being very fortunate and oh so grateful to have what I have. I can't think of anything better than trying to help someone else realize their dream of being self-sufficient. This is truly a wonderful organization.

lender.name: Jerry
lender.loan_because: I share my wealth and happiness with others through loans i make.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: Someone is in need and I can help. It's as simple and honest as that. If I can help someone extablish or continue a business to take care of their family, or themself, it would be sad, not to.

lender.name: Caroline
lender.loan_because: my job is to love.
lender.occupational_info: work on programs for television

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: The universe has given me an incredible opportunity to earn wealth through entrepreneurship and I believe in giving back.
lender.occupational_info: At its essence, all business is the same, its fulfilling a customer's need and doing so in a way that creates a profit. I just happen to have a specific skill set and market knowledge that allows me to do through the creation of "intellectual property" driven businesses that are scalable and create lots of profits. Essentially, instead of selling "shoes", I sell "ideas" and once I've got the idea sales channel in place, I can sell an infinite # of the same "idea" at no cost.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.occupational_info: I represent individuals charged with crimes who cannot afford to hire an attorney.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I am able too at this time and I want to help people succeed and make them a little happier if I can.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I can. In all honesty, if I can help someone who is able and willing to work to improve their life, but just needs a little help getting started then I am more than happy to do it.

lender.name: raymundo
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be aware of our shared humanity
lender.occupational_info: I.T. fixed computers, network and stuff. It is what pays my bills and allows me to do what I enjoy (outdoors, travel, food) life

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: I can help. Maybe not a lot, but I'm glad that Kiva helps me to do something.
lender.occupational_info: I teach and research in computing - mostly on the "people" side of the technology.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: it feels great to help someone in need and to let them know that others in the world want to make their lives better.

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: I want to live my life generously~

lender.name: paulette
lender.loan_because: i don't have a lot of $ and yet i want to help everyone. so this is a way to donate a small amount and make a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: for years i tried to lose weight and then i found out i could be a model for plus size women. i started at 40. i am now 61 and have had a small successful career. in the past, while i was raising my children, I worked as a restaurant manager, car salesperson, bartender, waitress and accountant and this is by far more fun.

lender.name: satomi
lender.loan_because: There is no them.

lender.name: Dennis
lender.loan_because: Helping is a gift those of us fortunate to have extra money are blessed with to share with others.
lender.occupational_info: When not working I love NASCAR, Boston Red Sox and New England Patriots. I ran my first and only marathon in 2006 in Chicago. I have run several 1/2 marathons.

lender.name: Martha
lender.loan_because: I can...and I hope to make a difference in someone's life. Dream big!...

lender.name: Sara & Gilbert
lender.loan_because: This is one way we can share what we are blessed to have with others.
lender.occupational_info: Sara teaches English as a Second Language to immigrants. Gilbert is a Registered Nurse in the Emergency Department.

lender.name: Sophie
lender.loan_because: Everyone wants the best for their families. Financial security is critical for this. It may help give peace of mind, and hopefully engender peace for all. Despite those lofty goals, I just hope to alleviate some worry.
lender.occupational_info: Activist.

lender.name: Vy Han
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of knowing where the money I loan goes. I don't like giving money blindly to just any charity w/o seeing it effectively used. This, however, is different.
lender.occupational_info: I am a very poor student trying my best to become a doctor someday in the field of oncology. My family and I don't make much money and we make-do with what we have. I have a part-job as well while going to school in order to pay for my expenses. However, whatever money I have left, I want to help people with it.

lender.name: Lemuel
lender.loan_because: I know how it feels to start..back then, God knows back when the dinosaurs roamed Los Angeles, CA. I too started, and no one believed in me but myself. I made it, life is wonderful..Now its time to give back ....
lender.occupational_info: I am your typical immigrant in the United States that started life in America with practically nothing. My dad , mom and me came here with 5 dollars in our pocket back in 1979..with a hard work life is now wonderful...it is just a matter of work ethic..

lender.name: Kristine
lender.loan_because: I am a student struggling in college to be able to one day make a nice living for my family. I feel that I can connect with these people due to that.
lender.occupational_info: Studying, going to class, homework, and also working a part-time job in computer technical support.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I feel it is important to give back. Helping your fellow man can only make the world a better place for everyone.

lender.name: Stefan
lender.occupation: Petty officer in the Danish Navy

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because:
I can think of few things more rewarding than to help build a better future!
Knowing I can make a difference gives me hope and energy to keep working hard for a better future for all of us. Funny how giving can be so rewarding!
lender.occupational_info: I do writing and copy-editing in the coorporate world, banking mostly.

lender.name: LINDA
lender.loan_because: I LOVE HELPING PEOPLE THAT WILL WORK. THEREFORE, IT HELPS THE WHOLE COMMUNITY.
lender.occupational_info: I SEW. I MAKE QUILTED ITEMS AND ALSO TAKE IN HEMMING UP PANTS AND SKIRTS. ITS GIVES ME SOMETHING TO DO AND MAKE EXTRA MONEY.

lender.name: Norma
lender.loan_because: I grew up in an era when you were expected to create your future through personal effort and hard work. I applaud the desire of the loan applicants to improve their circumstances.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: In order to make a difference in the world. Although a small amount its the easiest way as an individual to make a difference.

lender.name: candace
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I sell on e-bay and travel with my husband , he works mostly at power plants putting in fire protection. So I takee pictures of where we live.

lender.name: Jenifer
lender.loan_because: I have so much to be grateful for! There is enough to go around.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a furniture store, moving new furniture out onto the sales floor and making it look pretty with accessories and pictures. :)

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: I am unbelievably blessed! Having so much, I want to help others have an opportunity to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I teach at a university.

lender.name: Jessica Foley
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a psychotherapist for women!

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I believe pigs can fly.
lender.occupational_info: I use my photographs to create fashion marketing products.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I feel blessed to be able to make someone else's life a little better.

lender.name: Cambialaria
lender.occupational_info: We are a vocal ensemble in Seattle, Washington. We redirect 100% of our performance fees and donations to the world's poor.

lender.name: Bobby
lender.loan_because: I like to help.

lender.name: Lorine
lender.loan_because: it allows me to help improve other people's lives as well as my own.
lender.occupational_info: I communicate ideas and feelings through design that you would see in everyday lifeâfrom logos, posters, packaging, books, and more.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: I give a percentage of my income to others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a certified life coach and speaker specializing in helping women fulfill their potential.

lender.name: Girls Gotta Eat
lender.loan_because: I've been privileged to be born in this country with an abundance of opportunities. I would like to give back and help someone else lift themselves up.
lender.occupational_info: I try to find ways to use my 20 yrs of experience in fashion after leaving the corporate world. Consulting, Ebay and blogging.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: we should all help people get a start or pursue a dream.
lender.occupational_info: a lot of important work that seems mindless in context of what most go through, but I know it is an important part of the wheel of life.

lender.name: Matthew C
lender.loan_because: I like seeing ambitious people succeed, and I hate to see them punished for failure. I've barely earned this money, anyhow.
lender.occupational_info: Type type type. Think think think. Type type type. Coffee. Pee. Think Think Think. Type Type Type.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: I want other people to be able to take advantage of the opportunities they find. I want to give someone hope.
lender.occupational_info: I am a listener and a watcher. I sit quietly and write down what people say on a little machine in a special language or code. That code is then sent to a computer that translates it into English. It is a great job where I meet new people every day. It has great challenges and great flexibility.

lender.name: Bonnie
lender.loan_because: My life has been blessed and I want to share.
lender.occupational_info: I used to help people save for their retirement. Now in my retirement, I want to help save people.

lender.name: Megan M.
lender.occupational_info: I help people do things!

lender.name: Franz
lender.loan_because: everyone should cultivate loving-kindness, compassion, taking joy in other's success, and treating everyone equally. These are the four sublime states of mind.
lender.occupational_info: I am an educator. Knowledge is a gift that enables the students to become self-sufficient and make the world a better place.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: stay at home mom to seven month and 11 year old while partner goes to college

lender.name: Valerie
lender.loan_because: I think this is a fantastic opportunity to help someone make a difference in their lives and the lives of their family. It takes an adventurous spirit to start your own business. I admire that and feel honoured to be able to help in this small way.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that manufactures lamp and socket assemblies that go into the instrument panels of cars. I am responsible for all manufacturing departments including maintaining production levels to meet customer requirements.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: This is a wonderful opportunity to help my fellow business owners around the world.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I have been in business for 31 years. We now have a pet shop that we started 20 years ago.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: I am excited about the opportunity to give to women who, through their strength and determination, are finding ways to help themselves and their communities. Their efforts will have long-standing and long-reaching affects on their families and communities.

lender.name: David
lender.occupational_info: I am a professor and an entrepreneur (www.versive.com). My web service, VroomÂ®, services small business in the United States.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I can't think of a good reason not to.
lender.occupational_info: I am a postgraduate student at Harris Manchester College, University of Oxford.

lender.name: Robley
lender.loan_because: I am also an Entrepreneur and many of these individuals do not have the same opportunities that I enjoy in America. I'm grateful for the opportunity to lend money because it helps these hard working people stay in business and hopefully improve their lives and those around them.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a serial entrepreneur, owning several businesses myself.

lender.name: Wendy and Jonathan
lender.loan_because: It WORKS!!!! And without being "used up" (just like a catalyst) - someone's life is improved, then the money is (usually) returned to the system to help someone else! And so on...

lender.name: Malik
lender.occupation: Executive Director of a youth charity

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: To give is to receive.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: God has given my husband and me so many blessings that we want to share.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: There is a need and I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I admire each one of these hard workers and want to share God's blessings. We can all help make the world a better place by giving our support and love.

lender.name: Melody
lender.loan_because: Because I care and want to make a difference in someone's life

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I would like to help others, so they get started and one day help others in the same way
lender.occupational_info: I work with computer aided design of manufacturing areas and am a technical writer of procedures, analyze business measurements to take actions for improvement

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: My God has blessed me w/ much. So I must pay it forward, as best I can, to show my appreciation to The Creator....
lender.occupational_info: My retirement does not cover all my bills, so have to work part time (when I can get the work) to cover my monthly costs.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I help whoever shows up at my hospital injured or sick.

lender.name: Mariko
lender.loan_because: It's a wonderful way to help those who want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Run an investment advisory company specialized in alternative investment.

lender.name: kelly
lender.loan_because: I think it is important that people be able to follow their dreams.Money should not be such an issue.
lender.occupational_info: I create lifeboats and legacies for all of my clients.

lender.name: Jake\s Family
lender.loan_because: "How far you go in life depends on your being tender with the young, compassionate with the aged, sympathetic with the striving and tolerant of the weak and strong - because someday in life you will have been all of these." - George Washington Carver

lender.name: St Luke
lender.loan_because: Because of our belief in Jesus Christ, we invest in just causes so that God's grace may be known among all peoples.
lender.occupational_info: Our work is to help spread the good news of God's love for all of mankind.

lender.name: Lou Llewellyn
lender.loan_because: I can't go through life using both hand to to catch every benefit that comes to me. To truly live, I feel I have to throw benefits to others as well.
lender.occupational_info: I am a co-owner in a small family owned business and I also work in advertising.

lender.name: Angelique
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to be able to help someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I develop and execute marketing campaigns for a small cosmetics company.

lender.name: Fatima
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to have what I need and I want to help those who are in need as well. I am so glad that this vehicle is available to help others to realize their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I enjoy my career because I can accomplish so much helping others.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: "For unto whomsoever much is given, of him shall be much required."

lender.name: Walker & Lauren
lender.loan_because: It is a great way to learn about Giving!. We want to help other kids across the world.
lender.occupational_info: We are just kids who live in a small town in Texas with only 1100 residents.

lender.name: Shiva
lender.loan_because: i need to under go limb lengthening operation for that i require $20,000/-. i promise to repay the loan in 6 years. pls help me
lender.occupational_info: i need to under go limb lengthening operation for that i require $20,000/-. i promise to repay the loan in 6 years.

lender.name: Beth
lender.occupation: Full time stay at home mom
lender.loan_because: I know there are many people throughout this world that could help themselves so much more in this life if they only a few extra dollars. I have hope and faith that humanity can learn to look beyond race, color, and geographic location and simply help each other.

lender.name: Ted
lender.occupational_info: I help people and businesses resolve disputes and represent them in court if they can't

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: We should all be helping each other out.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of pets- it gives me great joy to comfort a pet when their owner is away.

lender.name: Jackie
lender.loan_because: I feel the best way to help someone is by giving them the ability to support themselves, making them self suffient and proud.
lender.occupational_info: I remanufacture cartridges for all types of printers. By doing this we are helping the environment while saving the end user money. My husband and I started our business in 1993.

lender.name: Steph
lender.loan_because: It's important to give back.

lender.name: Mandi
lender.loan_because: I believe that if everyone helped, even just a little bit, this world would be a much better place.
lender.occupational_info: I help adults who are trying to go to college decide where they want to go, what they want to do, and help them apply for money to go. We specialize in helping low-income and first-generation students.

lender.name: Maryam
lender.loan_because: I want my children (and everyone's children) to live in a better world.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a doctor in an emergency department.

lender.name: Swati
lender.loan_because: I find the act of assisting someone become self-sufficient very rewarding.
lender.occupational_info: I do marketing for a reputable manufacturer of high-end bathroom products.

lender.name: Bret
lender.loan_because: I want to give back and help others
lender.occupational_info: Business Development

lender.name: Kay
lender.loan_because: God has given people to help me and now I have the joy in helping others. I am a born-again Christian.
lender.occupational_info: I did work with mechanics, and other people who sort packages on multi-hundred ton machinery. The packages will be sent to people in the United States and all over the world.

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: I love to travel and know I have it more fortunate than others.

lender.name: Tess
lender.loan_because: It's time we look after each other.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at Boise State University (Go Broncos!), working toward a Master of Engineering in Computer Engineering. I work on a team designing printers.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I have been lucky in my life to have traveled to many places in this world. When traveling, I love meeting the local people, eating new foods, and learning about different cultures. I have seen first hand and know the great impact that small business people can have for thier families and in thier community. These loans are so great and can do so much good. It makes me feel good to help people develop these businesses.
lender.occupational_info: My background is in agriculture, I like pig and grain farming. I currently help scientists and doctors develop new human drugs.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: people will understand the gospel of Christ through the love and generosity of people who know him.
lender.occupational_info: I am a pastor. I show young people the love of Christ, and try to love others with them.

lender.name: michelle and corey
lender.occupation: Stay at home Mom and computer consultant
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference in the world, because all of us share the same planet.

lender.name: Penny
lender.loan_because: I was married, had 2 children, and was divorced with no job skills at the age of 25. With a lot of hard work and help from family I was able to have a great career and retire at 55. Donating to Kiva is a way to give back to others who are owning their destiny and working hard to support themselves & their family.

lender.name: Ellen
lender.loan_because: My life is so blessed that I want to share those blessings with others in need. "Be the change you want to see in the world." Mahatma Gandhi
lender.occupational_info: I am a 2nd grade teacher in a classroom of 20 boys and girls. My students are between 7-8 years old. I teach them reading, math, science, social studies, character education and many social skills. I love what I do!

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I can and should. What a great organization!
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office, on a stage (performer) and around my house. It's all good.

lender.name: Rose
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to help someone trying hard to improve their lives.

lender.name: Tiffany
lender.loan_because: Pay it forward...

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: Like being able to know about who receives the loans

lender.name: Kara
lender.loan_because: It feels good to do something for someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I am a doctor who takes care of adults in a medical clinic.

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: Life is about giving! May each of us extend our blessings to those in need!

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: Opportunity is a gift. The spirit of the Kiva organization is inspiring and I am excited for the opportunity to be a part of it.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mother of an amazing nine year old girl. My career began as an elementary school teacher, but now I work in the wild world of startups at TechCrunch.

lender.name: Annie
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves a chance to achieve greatness

lender.name: renee
lender.loan_because: God.
lender.occupational_info: that would be difficult. Everyone does not own a computer!

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I have enormous admiration for people all over the world who work so hard to improve their lives and the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the finances for a number of US Television productions seen around the country.

lender.name: Marcia
lender.loan_because: I have so much and they have so little - not just.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: It's a wonderful feeling to make a difference in someones life.

lender.name: Dan and Tina
lender.loan_because: We would like to provide opportunity for people around the world to do what they love and improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: Dan manufactures chemicals that are used to make medicines and other products. Tina manages the household and takes care of their 2 children.

lender.name: Brian and Jemma
lender.loan_because: I loan through Kiva because I believe it is the best way to get the most money directly to the people that can most benefit from it. I make loans because I realize I am extremely lucky to have been born into the place and time that I was. But for an accident of fate, I would be needing the assistance I can easily give now.
lender.occupational_info: I do emergency mental health evaluations. I meet with people who are experiencing a personal crisis and I try to help determine that person can saty safe and get the help they need.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I am a business owner myself. I have everything I need. Opportunity is a gift, and giving to fulfill a dream makes me happy! Everyone needs a little help from time to time.
lender.occupational_info: We prepare land for buildings and homes. I work in the office and do accounting and billing for the business.

lender.name: Karan
lender.loan_because: A great way for one person to make a difference
lender.occupational_info: I taught elementary school in a rural area for 30 years. Now retired.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I really like that the funds are going directly to those in need of a hand up not a hand out. I respect and admire these entrepreneurs for their hard work and determination to provide a good life for their families.

lender.name: cheryl
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do and it makes me happy knowing I can help others.
lender.occupational_info: Internet ventures

lender.name: angelina
lender.loan_because: As a struggeling musician for 15 years, I have drained all my finances just to obtain little items that make a big difference. For example, guitar, keyboard, sound equipment, etc. To date the only item I have been able to obtain on my own was my Ovation Guitar and it took me 5 months to pay for it. I am a single 31 yr old woman, high school graduate and currently trying to obtain a grant to go to the University of Phoenix, online course. Coming from a poor family has had it's hardships but I have learned to work for what I want. I needed a website badly (all musicians do) but since I could not afford to pay hundreds and hundreds of dollars to get one, I learned the software myself and built the website on my own. It would so nice, and I would be forever grateful if there was some kind of help available. With the right funds I can record in the studio, make a demo, send it out to the right people, pay for my songwriting which is a huge expense, and continue in my path of making my dreams a reality. I have a lazy eye which has debilitated me. I was working as a legal secretary until 4 years ago. Then I started the web design on the side,...however my left eye is now legally blind and it is effecting my ability to work on a computer at a desk. I have to minimize that time as much as possible or I spend my days dizzy and sick. Not many jobs in this town and my income is less than $400.00 a month. I am forever grateful to those who can help. Thank you so very much!
lender.occupational_info: Singer, songwriter, musician and passionate lover of music....seeks funds to continue dream.... disability enables the ability to work to support career. Anyone that can help, I am forever grateful.

lender.name: Francisca
lender.loan_because: we need to empower women all over the globe!
lender.occupational_info: i work in the Environmental Health Coalition. forming a youth group in our community to fight environmental racism

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I thoroughly respect and admire the people Kiva lends to. Even though, in many cases, they have limited means and are often living in unstable regions, the vast majority of them repay their obligations.
lender.occupational_info: I remind people of their commitments and hold them to their deadlines. Basically, I am a professional pesterer.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.occupation: Managing Director - IT and Engineering Firm
lender.loan_because: I have been very fortunate in my life and I want to give back to others.
lender.occupational_info: I hire technology and engineering consultants to work on projects across the United States.

lender.name: Pam
lender.loan_because: You get to share a little part of someone's dream

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: If I have food on my table and a roof over my head, then I can give a little of what I have to help somebody else achive the same.

lender.name: dean and julie
lender.loan_because: We have been so blessed with a beautiful, healthy family. We LOVE this organization!!

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: For unto whomsoever much is given, of him shall be much required.

lender.name: Edan
lender.loan_because: I like helping people who help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I help my company's philanthropic activities and help employees volunteer for non-profit organizations.

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: We are all connected ...
lender.occupational_info: I teach at a university. I am also a photographer, welder, and critic.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: I achieved success and happiness by having people in my life who cared enough to help me reach my goals. I want to do that for others.
lender.occupational_info: I retired early from my career in Human Resources.

lender.name: Rissa
lender.loan_because: I want to. I loan because I should. I loan because I can. I loan because it makes me feel good. And, honestly, who doesn't like to feel good?

lender.name: Jacqui
lender.loan_because: I am so lucky to be in a safe and healthy environment. I am 67 and still work and as long as I can help change the world I will give.
lender.occupational_info: I raise funds to build a Metropolitan Park here in California.

lender.name: Thomas & Hedwig Ford
lender.loan_because: We think small businesses are the basis for a countries economy. These people deserve our help as they help themselves.

lender.name: Natasha
lender.loan_because: I think this is an awesome way to help people. A small donation can make a big difference.
lender.occupational_info: I help my company find the right people to do the job. I also help people find the right job.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: It feels good to be able to help a few people around the world in this small way.
lender.occupational_info: I write computer software that is used for creating video games.

lender.name: Donald & Jennifer
lender.loan_because: We wish to make the world a better place for the next generation by giving a hand up to one parent/family at a time. What have you done today to help another person?

lender.name: Marguerite
lender.loan_because: I know that the more I give in this life, the more I will be blessed.
lender.occupational_info: I run a birth center were woman can have a happy, healty and safe birth.

lender.name: Linking Paths
lender.loan_because: As entrepreneurs we know perfectly how hard can be sometimes to raise money for the ideas you believe in. We want to help others in this subject as much as we want others to believe in us.
lender.occupational_info: We're a young micro-ISV doing web-apps for a few years.

lender.name: Kendale
lender.loan_because: I believe you have to give to receive.
lender.occupational_info: I do network support for a large corporation.

lender.name: Dolores
lender.loan_because: I care and I can
lender.occupational_info: artist
